thread.section_title: The Towers at Lotte New York Palace - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great Hitel
thread.title_full: Great Hitel - Review of The Towers at Lotte New York Palace, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Ralph R
title: Great Hitel
text:
Came to stay in a Corner Suite and I must say it is impressive. It features a very spacious living room with a kitchenette, foyer a large separate bedroom with a king size bed and a desk and 1.5 bathrooms.
It is located between 50th and 51st on Madison Avenue in Midtown East.
This is now our Hotel of choice when in NYC.
2 things that I would improve on.
I needs a Nespresso Machine and a small fridge. Since there is no coffee machine in the Suite. It does feature a microwave but no fridge to keep any food.
